summary: The module scans GitHub Actions workflow files, parses and validates their YAML content, builds an internal graph representation, loads applicable security checks, applies runner filters and external checks, and produces a security report. Supporting utilities locate workflow directories, identify workflow files, read and parse their definitions, and validate them against the official GitHub Actions schema.
business_intent: Provide automated security analysis of GitHub Actions configurations to detect misconfigurations, policy violations, and compliance issues within CI/CD pipelines.
